# Creeping Cold (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]] \[[[Cold Spells|cold]]]

**Level:** [[2nd Level Druid Spells|Druid 2]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 3rd-Level Druid Spells List|Druid 3]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, F

**Range:** Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)

**Target:** One creature

**Duration:** 3 rounds

**Saving Throw:** Fortitude half

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** Spell Compendium (WotC), pg. 55

*Reaching out your hand and making a crushing motion, you turn the subjectâ€™s sweat to ice, creating blisters as the ice forms on and inside the skin.*

The subject takes 1d6 cumulative points of cold damage per round (that is, 1d6 on the 1st round, 2d6 on the second, and 3d6 on the third). Only one save is allowed against the spell; if successful, it halves the damage each round.

*Focus:* A small glass or pottery vessel worth at least 25 gp filled with ice, snow, or water.
